calculator.belong:
This calculator does not belong to you!
You can create your own calculator by doing `/calculator`
calculator.tooLong: The current inputted equation is too long! Please shorten your equation or break them up into multiple equation!

connect4.bots: You cannot play Connect4 with Bots
connect4.invitation:
{{challenger}} has invited you to a game of Connect4
Click the buttons below to accept or deny.

You have 60 seconds to decide.
connect4.notBelong: You are not allowed to press the buttons for this message.
connect4.decline: The opponent declined your Connect4 Request
connect4.notTurn: It is not your turn yet!
connect4.tie: This game ends in a tie

flood.title: Flood Minigame
flood.win: Congrats! You won this round of flood.

hangman.notBelong: You are not allowed to press the buttons for this message.

rps.title: Rock Paper Scissors
rps.timeout: You did not provide a reaction in time

slots.title: Slots Minigame
slots.lose: You lost! Better luck next time.

trivia.guessIncorrect: Your guess was incorrect! Better luck next time!

won.title: Game Completed!
won.desc:
You Won! Congratulations!
The word was **{{word}}**

lost.title: Game Over!
lost.desc:
You Lost! Better luck next time!
The word was **{{word}}**
